title: HAP 66 - Lifting the Veil - Introducing W.E.B. Du Bois
itunes:title: HAP 66 - Lifting the Veil - Introducing W.E.B. Du Bois
description: W.E.B. Du Bois emerges as a historian, sociologist, and innovative philosophical thinker in the 1890s, and introduces his famous idea of "double consciousness."
